meanings.definition: Any of a group of steroid hormones that promote the development and maintenance of female characteristics of the body.
meanings.sent1: Oestrogens play a role in shaping female features.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes prescribe oestrogens to help with certain health conditions.
meanings.sent3: The oestrogens in the body are like the architects of femininity.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as warm and comforting as oestrogens flowing through her veins.
meanings.sent5: The scent of flowers in bloom was a reminder of the gentle power of oestrogens.

meanings.definition: A synthetic derivative of this hormone, used in oral contraceptives and in hormone replacement therapy.
meanings.sent1: Some medications contain artificial oestrogens for medical purposes.
meanings.sent2: Women may take oestrogens to manage menopausal symptoms.
meanings.sent3: The lab-created oestrogens were like little helpers in pill form.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence surged as if fueled by the synthetic oestrogens she took.
meanings.sent5: The artificial oestrogens were a shield against the effects of aging.
